I don't think that is the right part. It happens right at 10 seconds in, ri=
ght after you hear my zipper on my pack. Give it another go.

  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
 =
 Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 6:48 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] EVP [1 Attac=
hment]


  [Attachment(s) from Kristin Morris included below] 



  April..=
 I hear it but it is so very faint..  I hear it as BACK HOME (or it could b=
e BACK ROOM) and just like me I reversed it.  In reverse it says BROTHER.  =
Anyway - that's my take.  I made a copy (leaving your original intact) and =
isolated that one part.  I slowed it down and enhanced the volume.  Listen =
to my attachment of both the forward and reverse.

  k




----------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------

  From: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Ab=
ercrombie
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 6:04 PM
  To: EVP-ITC Group
  Subj=
ect: [EVP-ITC] EVP








  Hi All,



  Please give this a listen. This w=
as recorded during my investigation on last Saturday. The anomaly occurs a =
10 seconds. I have not enhanced this clip at all. This is a raw wav file.

=


  Please let me know what you think.



  http://www.esnips.com/webfolder=
/77e5c5b7-fc2c-4413-a70b-6ce25c77a5a7



  April
